item.description:
Jeff Popkin at Boston Event Guide has invited the Red Sox Natives to join him on this pub crawl through Fanuel Hall on Saturday, December 8th.

Start Time is 2:00pm thru 8:00pm

Registration check in is from 12:30pm to 2:00pm

Need Wrist Bands for Free Cover at 8 stops

There is food at select stops

Drink Spcials starting at $1.75

Search for the best Mrs Clause or Outrageous Holiday Outfit, Ugly Sweater, Santa Hat, Christmas Speedo ...costumes

Tickets are 2 for $20.00 OR use "Crawl" Promo Code while available for 2 tickets and 1 Tee Shirt

Tickets, updates and more info at: http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/crawling_with_mrs_claus.htm

Expect a large, festive, friendly crowd with many in costume. Other meetup groups (Boston Happy Hour) will be there as well.

Bring your cameras!
item.how_to_find_us: E Mail will be sent to Yes RSVPs the night before the event.
item.name: Crawling with Mrs Clause Pub Crawl Saturday December 8th
